name: Bouquet Keeper
description:
A little solitaire like about making bouquets out of a set of 36 flower-cards.

Gorgeous Music written by : https://twitter.com/yasminelatkowsk

TIPS:

Play the cards evenly, so that each card pile stays approximately the same size as you continue through. This will allow you to finish the game.

(I'm still fixing up and tweaking the game)
